resources.string:
01.GO to your bKash app or Dial *247# 
 02.Choose "Send Money" 
 03.Enter below Bkash Account Number 
 04.Now Enter Total amount 
 05.Now enter your bKash PIN to confram the transaction 
 07.Copy Transaction ID from paymnet confrimation and pest the transction ID below

01.GO to your Nagad app or Dial *167# 
 02.Choose "Send Money" 
 03.Enter below Nagad Number 
 04.Now Enter Total amount 
 05.Now enter your bKash PIN to confram the transaction 
 07.Copy Transaction ID from paymnet confrimation and pest the transction ID below

01.GO to your Roket app or Dial *322# 
 02.Choose "Send Money" 
 03.Enter below Roket Number 
 04.Now Enter Total amount 
 05.Now enter your bKash PIN to confram the transaction 
 07.Copy Transaction ID from paymnet confrimation and pest the transction ID below

01.GO to your Upay app or Dial *268# 
 02.Choose "Send Money" 
 03.Enter below Nagad Number 
 04.Now Enter Total amount 
 05.Now enter your bKash PIN to confram the transaction 
 07.Copy Transaction ID from paymnet confrimation and pest the transction ID below
